nodes.text: The Dragoneye Reaper was a blaster pistol. The original pistol was built from scavenged parts by the infamous bounty hunter Dragoneye. The weapon's popularity grew along with Dragoneye's fame among the criminal underworld. Soon many bounty hunters used their own versions of this weapon.
One model developed by an Outer Rim company was the C-10 version.
The C-10 "Dragoneye Reaper" pistol can be looted from killed Kerritamba Wookiees in the Kkowir Forest in Star Wars Galaxies.
